mapper.sql: id, detail, fbid, country, paypal, prolink, proname, mainpagenum, countbuy, liuping, shouhou, remark, grade, earlybuy, nearbuy
mapper.insert: insert into commentman (id, detail, fbid, country, paypal, prolink, proname, mainpagenum, countbuy, liuping, shouhou, remark, grade, earlybuy, nearbuy ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paypal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prolink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{proname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainpagenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countbuy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liuping,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shouhou,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{earlybuy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nearbuy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update commentman
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fbid = #{fbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
paypal = #{paypal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
prolink = #{prolink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proname = #{proname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mainpagenum = #{mainpagenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
countbuy = #{countbuy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
liuping = #{liuping,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shouhou = #{shouhou,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
earlybuy = #{earlybuy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nearbuy = #{nearbuy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update commentman set detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fbid = #{fbid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, paypal = #{paypal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, prolink = #{prolink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proname = #{proname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mainpagenum = #{mainpagenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, countbuy = #{countbuy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, liuping = #{liuping,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shouhou = #{shouhou,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, earlybuy = #{earlybuy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, nearbuy = #{nearbuy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from commentman where id in (select e.id from (select id,REVERSE(RIGHT(REVERSE(orderid),INSTR(REVERSE(orderid),'.'))) orderid2 from (select id,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(c.detail),INSTR(REVERSE(c.detail),'/')-1)) orderid from commentman c) d) e where e.orderid2 not in (select id from commentman_order))
